creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: And on the third day, The COVID Messiah had risen! Back to spread the word and the disease. To once again mock the thousands of dead, and millions of sick. Hallelujah!
title: October 6, 2020: The RESURRECTION OF SAINT COVID
